property.name: build
property.shortdesc: The build number of Adobe Photoshop application.

property.name: systemInformation
property.shortdesc: System information of the host application and machine.

property.name: measurementLog
property.shortdesc: The log of measurements taken.

property.name: currentTool
property.shortdesc: Name of the current tool.

method.name: toolSupportsBrushes
method.shortdesc: Check if the specified tool supports brushes.

parameter.name: tool
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the tool to check.

method.name: doProgress
method.shortdesc: Performs a task with a progress bar. Other progress APIs must be called periodically to update the progress bar and allow cancelling.

parameter.name: progressString
parameter.shortdesc: String to show in the progress window.

parameter.name: javaScriptString
parameter.shortdesc: JavaScriptString to execute.

method.name: doForcedProgress
method.shortdesc: Performs a task with a progress bar. Forces progress bar to display, ignoring the normal heuristics that keep it from showing unnecessarily (e.g. during very short tasks). Other progress APIs must be called periodically to update the progress bar and allow cancelling.

parameter.name: progressString
parameter.shortdesc: String to show in the progress window.

parameter.name: javaScriptString
parameter.shortdesc: JavaScriptString to execute.

method.name: changeProgressText
method.shortdesc: Changes the text that appears in the progress window.

parameter.name: progressString
parameter.shortdesc: String to show in the progress window.

method.name: doProgressTask
method.shortdesc: Sections off a portion of the unused progress bar for execution of a subtask. Returns false on cancel.

parameter.name: taskLength
parameter.shortdesc: Amount of the unused progress bar to section off, between 0.0 and 1.0.

parameter.name: javaScriptString
parameter.shortdesc: JavaScriptString to execute.

method.name: doProgressSegmentTask
method.shortdesc: Sections off a portion of the unused progress bar for execution of a subtask. Returns false on cancel. Use when iterating a list of tasks with unequal run times.

parameter.name: segmentLength
parameter.shortdesc: The length of the current task.

parameter.name: done
parameter.shortdesc: The total length of all completed tasks.

parameter.name: total
parameter.shortdesc: The total length of all tasks.

parameter.name: javaScriptString
parameter.shortdesc: JavaScriptString to execute.

method.name: doProgressSubTask
method.shortdesc: Sections off a portion of the unused progress bar for execution of a subtask. Returns false on cancel. Use when iterating a simple list of tasks with equal run times.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The 0-based index of the current task.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.shortdesc: The total number of tasks.

parameter.name: javaScriptString
parameter.shortdesc: JavaScriptString to execute.

method.name: updateProgress
method.shortdesc: Updates the progress bar started by doProgress. Use for manual non-task based progress updating. Returns false on cancel.

parameter.name: done
parameter.shortdesc: The number of tasks completed.

parameter.name: total
parameter.shortdesc: The total number of tasks.

method.name: togglePalettes
method.shortdesc: Toggle palette visibility.

method.name: doAction
method.shortdesc: Plays the specified action from the Actions palette.

parameter.name: action
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the action to play. (Note that the action name is case-sensitive and must match the name as it appears in the Actions palette.)

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the action set containing the action being played. (Note that the Action Set name is case-sensitive and must match the name as it appears in the Actions palette.)

method.name: load
method.shortdesc: Loads a support document.

parameter.name: document
parameter.shortdesc: The document to load.

method.name: open
method.shortdesc: Opens the specified document file(s).

parameter.name: document
parameter.shortdesc: The document(s) to opend.

parameter.name: as
parameter.shortdesc: The document type (The default is to let Photoshop deduce the format).

parameter.name: asSmartObject
parameter.shortdesc: Creates a smart object around the document.

method.name: purge
method.shortdesc: Purges one or more caches.

parameter.name: target
parameter.shortdesc: The caches to purge.

method.name: makePhotoGallery
method.shortdesc: DEPRECATED. Creates a web photo gallery.

parameter.name: inputFolder
parameter.shortdesc: Folder to process or an array of files to process.

parameter.name: outputFolder
parameter.shortdesc: Location for output files.

parameter.name: options
parameter.shortdesc: Options for the web photo gallery.

method.name: makePDFPresentation
method.shortdesc: Creates a PDF presentation file.

parameter.name: inputFiles
parameter.shortdesc: The input files to include in the presentation.

parameter.name: outputFile
parameter.shortdesc: The location of the output file.

parameter.name: options
parameter.shortdesc: Options for the PDF presentation.

method.name: makePhotomerge
method.shortdesc: DEPRECATED. Merges multiple files into one, user interaction required.

parameter.name: inputFiles
parameter.shortdesc: List of input files to include.

method.name: makeContactSheet
method.shortdesc: Creates a contact sheet from multiple files.

parameter.name: inputFiles
parameter.shortdesc: The files to include.

parameter.name: options
parameter.shortdesc: Options for creating the contact sheet.

method.name: makePicturePackage
method.shortdesc: Creates a picture package from multiple files.

parameter.name: inputFiles
parameter.shortdesc: The files to include.

parameter.name: options
parameter.shortdesc: Options for creating a Picture Package.

method.name: batch
method.shortdesc: Runs the batch automation routine; analogous to using the Batch command in Photoshop.

parameter.name: inputFiles
parameter.shortdesc: The files to operate on.

parameter.name: action
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the action to play (note that the Action name is case-sensitive and must match the name in the Actions palette).

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the action set containing the action being played (note that the Action Set name is case-sensitive and must match the name in the Actions palette).

parameter.name: options
parameter.shortdesc: Options for batch automation.

method.name: bringToFront
method.shortdesc: Makes Photoshop the active application.

method.name: refresh
method.shortdesc: Pauses the script until the application refreshes.

method.name: refreshFonts
method.shortdesc: Force the font list to get refreshed.

method.name: putCustomOptions
method.shortdesc: Save user objects in the Photoshop registry.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The unique string ID for the user object.

parameter.name: customObject
parameter.shortdesc: The user-defined custom object to save in the registry.

parameter.name: persistent
parameter.shortdesc: If true, the object persists after the script has finished.

method.name: getCustomOptions
method.shortdesc: Retrieves user objects from the Photoshop registry for the ID with value key.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The unique string ID for the user object.

method.name: eraseCustomOptions
method.shortdesc: Removes the specified user objects from the Photoshop registry.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The unique string ID for user object(s) to remove.

method.name: featureEnabled
method.shortdesc: If true, the specified feature is enabled.

parameter.name: name
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the feature.

method.name: openDialog
method.shortdesc: Uses the Photoshop open dialog to select files.

method.name: runMenuItem
method.shortdesc: Run a menu item.

parameter.name: menuID
parameter.shortdesc: Id of menu to run.

method.name: system
method.shortdesc: Perform a system call.

parameter.name: callString
parameter.shortdesc: System call string.

method.name: executeAction
method.shortdesc: Plays an ActionManager event.

parameter.name: eventID
parameter.shortdesc: The event to play.

parameter.name: descriptor
parameter.shortdesc: The action descriptor to play.

parameter.name: displayDialogs
parameter.shortdesc: The display permissions for dialogs and alert messages.

method.name: executeActionGet
method.shortdesc: Obtains an action descriptor.

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference specification of the property.

method.name: stringIDToTypeID
method.shortdesc: Converts from a string ID to a runtime ID.

parameter.name: stringID
parameter.shortdesc: The ID to convert.

method.name: typeIDToStringID
method.shortdesc: Converts from a runtime ID to a string ID.

parameter.name: typeID
parameter.shortdesc: The ID to convert.

method.name: charIDToTypeID
method.shortdesc: Converts from a four character code to a runtime ID.

parameter.name: charID
parameter.shortdesc: The ID to convert.

method.name: typeIDToCharID
method.shortdesc: Converts from a runtime ID to a character ID.

parameter.name: typeID
parameter.shortdesc: The ID to convert.

method.name: beep
method.shortdesc: Alerts the user.

method.name: isQuicktimeAvailable
method.shortdesc: Returns true if Quicktime is installed.

method.name: showColorPicker
method.shortdesc: Display color picker dialog. Returns false if dialog is cancelled, true otherwise.

parameter.name: pickForeground
parameter.shortdesc: If true the foreground color is chosen, if false the background color is chosen.

classdef.name: Document
classdef.shortdesc: The active containment object for the layers and all other objects in the script; the basic canvas for the file.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: backgroundLayer
property.shortdesc: The background layer for the document.

property.name: bitsPerChannel
property.shortdesc: The number of bits per channel.

property.name: colorProfileType
property.shortdesc: The type of color model that defines the working space of the document.

property.name: colorProfileName
property.shortdesc: The name of the color profile. Valid only when no value is specified for color profile kind (to indicate a custom color profile).

property.name: mode
property.shortdesc: The color profile.

property.name: componentChannels
property.shortdesc: The color component channels for this document.

property.name: activeHistoryState
property.shortdesc: The current history state for this document.

property.name: activeHistoryBrushSource
property.shortdesc: The history state to use with the history brush.

property.name: activeLayer
property.shortdesc: The selected layer.

property.name: activeChannels
property.shortdesc: The selected channels.

property.name: info
property.shortdesc: Metadata about the document.

property.name: printSettings
property.shortdesc: Document print settings.

property.name: fullName
property.shortdesc: The full path name of the document.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The height of the document.

property.name: managed
property.shortdesc: If true, the document is a workgroup document.

property.name: saved
property.shortdesc: If true, the document been saved since the last change.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The document name.

property.name: path
property.shortdesc: The path to the document.

property.name: quickMaskMode
property.shortdesc: If true, the document is in Quick Mask mode.

property.name: resolution
property.shortdesc: The resolution of the document (in pixels per inch)

property.name: selection
property.shortdesc: The selected area of the document.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The width of the document.

property.name: histogram
property.shortdesc: A histogram showing the number of pixels at each color intensity level for the composite channel.
property.description: Valid only when 'mode' = RGB, CMYK, or indexed.

property.name: pixelAspectRatio
property.shortdesc: The (custom) pixel aspect ratio of the document. Range: 0.100 to 10.000.

property.name: xmpMetadata
property.shortdesc: The XMP properties of the document. The Camera RAW settings are stored here.

property.name: measurementScale
property.shortdesc: The measurement scale of the document.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of this document.

property.name: layers
property.shortdesc: The layers collection in the document.

property.name: layerSets
property.shortdesc: The layer sets collection in the document.

property.name: artLayers
property.shortdesc: The art layers collection in the document.

property.name: channels
property.shortdesc: The channels collection in this document.

property.name: guides
property.shortdesc: The guides in this document.

property.name: historyStates
property.shortdesc: The history states collection in this document.

property.name: layerComps
property.shortdesc: The layer comps collection in this document.

property.name: pathItems
property.shortdesc: The path items collection in this document.

property.name: countItems
property.shortdesc: The current count items in the document.

property.name: colorSamplers
property.shortdesc: The current color samplers associated with the document.

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicate this object.

method.name: close
method.shortdesc: Closes the document.

parameter.name: saving
parameter.shortdesc: Specifies whether changes should be saved before closing.

method.name: convertProfile
method.shortdesc: Converts the document from using one color profile to using another.

parameter.name: destinationProfile
parameter.shortdesc: The color profile to convert to. Either a string specifying a color profile, one of the working color spaces, or Lab color.

parameter.name: intent
parameter.shortdesc: The conversion intent.

parameter.name: blackPointCompensation
parameter.shortdesc: If true, black point compensation is used.

parameter.name: dither
parameter.shortdesc: If true, dither is used.

method.name: changeMode
method.shortdesc: Changes the mode of the document.

parameter.name: destinationMode
parameter.shortdesc: The mode to change to.

parameter.name: options
parameter.shortdesc: Options for changing the mode.

method.name: crop
method.shortdesc: Crops the document.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.shortdesc: The area to crop.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.shortdesc: The angle of cropping bounds.

parameter.name: width
parameter.shortdesc: The width of the resulting document.

parameter.name: height
parameter.shortdesc: The height of the resulting document.

method.name: exportDocument
method.shortdesc: Exports the document.

parameter.name: exportIn
parameter.shortdesc: The file to export to.

parameter.name: exportAs
parameter.shortdesc: The type of export.

parameter.name: options
parameter.shortdesc: Options for the specified export type.

method.name: flipCanvas
method.shortdesc: Flips the canvas horizontally or vertically.

parameter.name: direction
parameter.shortdesc: The direction in which to flip the canvas.

method.name: importAnnotations
method.shortdesc: Imports annotations into the document.

parameter.name: file
parameter.shortdesc: The document to import annotations from.

method.name: flatten
method.shortdesc: Flattens all layers.

method.name: mergeVisibleLayers
method.shortdesc: Flattens all visible layers in the document.

method.name: paste
method.shortdesc: Pastes contents of the clipboard into the document.

parameter.name: intoSelection
parameter.shortdesc: If true, contents are pasted into the current selection.

method.name: print
method.shortdesc: Prints the document.

parameter.name: sourceSpace
parameter.shortdesc: The color space for the source.

parameter.name: printSpace
parameter.shortdesc: The color space for the printer. Can be "nothing" (meaning same as source); one of the working spaces or Lab color; or a string specifying a color space. Default: nothing.

parameter.name: intent
parameter.shortdesc: The color conversion intent.

parameter.name: blackPointCompensation
parameter.shortdesc: If true, black point compensation is used.

method.name: printOneCopy
method.shortdesc: Print one copy of the document.

method.name: revealAll
method.shortdesc: Expands the document to show clipped sections.

method.name: rasterizeAllLayers
method.shortdesc: Rasterizes all layers.

method.name: recordMeasurements
method.shortdesc: Records the measurements of document.

parameter.name: source
parameter.shortdesc: The source of the measurements to record.

parameter.name: dataPoints
parameter.shortdesc: An array of identifiers of data points to record. Any data points not appropriate for the specified source are ignored.

method.name: rotateCanvas
method.shortdesc: Rotates the canvas.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.shortdesc: The number of degrees to rotate. A positive angle rotates the canvas clockwise; a negative value rotates the canvas counter-clockwise.

method.name: resizeCanvas
method.shortdesc: Changes the size of the canvas.

parameter.name: width
parameter.shortdesc: The desired width of the canvas.

parameter.name: height
parameter.shortdesc: The desired height of the canvas.

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.shortdesc: The anchor point to resize around.

method.name: resizeImage
method.shortdesc: Changes the size of the image.

parameter.name: width
parameter.shortdesc: The desired width of the image.

parameter.name: height
parameter.shortdesc: The desired height of the image.

parameter.name: resolution
parameter.shortdesc: The resolution (in pixels per inch)

parameter.name: resampleMethod
parameter.shortdesc: The downsample method.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: Amount of noise value when using preserve details (range: 0 - 100)

method.name: splitChannels
method.shortdesc: Splits the channels of the document.

method.name: save
method.shortdesc: Saves the document.

method.name: saveAs
method.shortdesc: Saves the document with the specified save options.

parameter.name: saveIn
parameter.shortdesc: The file to save to, specified as a string containing the full file path or an alias. If not specified, the document is saved to its existing file.

parameter.name: options
parameter.shortdesc: Options for the specified file type.

parameter.name: asCopy
parameter.shortdesc: Saves the document as a copy, leaving the original open.

parameter.name: extensionType
parameter.shortdesc: Appends the specified extension to the file name.

method.name: suspendHistory
method.shortdesc: Provides a single history state for the entire script. Allows a single undo for all actions taken in the script.

parameter.name: historyString
parameter.shortdesc: The string to use for the history state.

parameter.name: javaScriptString
parameter.shortdesc: A string of JavaScript code to execute during the suspension of history.

method.name: trap
method.shortdesc: Applies trapping to a CMYK document. Valid only when 'mode' = CMYK.

parameter.name: width
parameter.shortdesc: The trap width in pixels.

method.name: trim
method.shortdesc: Trims the transparent area around the image on the specified sides of the canvas.

parameter.name: type
parameter.shortdesc: The color or type of pixels to base the trim on.

parameter.name: top
parameter.shortdesc: If true, trims away the top of the document.

parameter.name: left
parameter.shortdesc: If true, trims away the left of the document.

parameter.name: bottom
parameter.shortdesc: If true, trims away the bottom of the document.

parameter.name: right
parameter.shortdesc: If true, trims away the right of the document.

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Creates a duplicate of the document object.

parameter.name: name
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the new document.

parameter.name: mergeLayersOnly
parameter.shortdesc: If ture, duplicates merged layers only.

method.name: autoCount
method.shortdesc: Counts the objects in the document.

parameter.name: channel
parameter.shortdesc: The channel to use for counting.

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.shortdesc: Threshold to use for counting. Range: 0 to 255.

classdef.name: DocumentInfo
classdef.shortdesc: Metadata about a document object. These values can be set by selecting File > File Info in the Adobe Photoshop application.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: title
property.shortdesc: The document title.

property.name: author
property.shortdesc: The author.

property.name: authorPosition
property.shortdesc: The author's position.

property.name: caption
property.shortdesc: The caption.

property.name: captionWriter
property.shortdesc: The caption author.

property.name: jobName
property.shortdesc: The job name.

property.name: copyrighted
property.shortdesc: The copyright status.

property.name: copyrightNotice
property.shortdesc: The copyright notice.

property.name: ownerUrl
property.shortdesc: The url of the copyright info.

property.name: keywords
property.shortdesc: A list of keywords.

property.name: category
property.shortdesc: The document category.

property.name: supplementalCategories
property.shortdesc: Other categories.

property.name: creationDate
property.shortdesc: The creation date.

property.name: city
property.shortdesc: The city.

property.name: provinceState
property.shortdesc: The state or province.

property.name: country
property.shortdesc: The country.

property.name: credit
property.shortdesc: The author credit.

property.name: source
property.shortdesc: The source.

property.name: headline
property.shortdesc: The headline.

property.name: instructions
property.shortdesc: Instructions for using or processing the image.

property.name: transmissionReference
property.shortdesc: The transmission reference.

property.name: urgency
property.shortdesc: The document urgency.

property.name: exif
property.shortdesc: For JPEG images, information stored with digital photographs including camera type, date and time of photo, and file size.

classdef.name: Preferences
classdef.shortdesc: Options to define for the preferences property of the application object, basically equivalent to selecting Edit > Preferences (Windows) or Photoshop > Preferences in the Adobe Photoshop application.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: colorPicker
property.shortdesc: The color picker to use.

property.name: interpolation
property.shortdesc: The method to use to assign color values to any new pixels created when an image is resampled or resized.

property.name: exportClipboard
property.shortdesc: If true, retains Adobe Photoshop contents on the clipboard after you exit the application.

property.name: showToolTips
property.shortdesc: If true, pop-up definitions are displayed on mouseover.

property.name: keyboardZoomResizesWindows
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically resizes the window when zooming in or out using keyboard shortcuts.

property.name: autoUpdateOpenDocuments
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically updates open documents.

property.name: showAsianTextOptions
property.shortdesc: If true, Asian text options are displayed in the Paragraph palette.

property.name: beepWhenDone
property.shortdesc: If true, alerts the user when a process finishes.

property.name: dynamicColorSliders
property.shortdesc: If true, dynamic color sliders appear in the Color palette.

property.name: savePaletteLocations
property.shortdesc: If true, makes new palette locations the default location.

property.name: showEnglishFontNames
property.shortdesc: If true, Asian font names are listed in English.

property.name: useShiftKeyForToolSwitch
property.shortdesc: If true, enables cycling through a set of hidden tools.

property.name: textFontSize
property.shortdesc: Size of the small font used in panels and dialogs.

property.name: numberOfHistoryStates
property.shortdesc: The number of history states to preserve. Range: 1 to 100.

property.name: createFirstSnapshot
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically makes the first snapshot when a new document is created.

property.name: nonLinearHistory
property.shortdesc: If true, allows non-linear history.

property.name: smartQuotes
property.shortdesc: If true, curly quote marks are used.

property.name: imagePreviews
property.shortdesc: The behavior mode to use when saving files.

property.name: iconPreview
property.shortdesc: If true, shows the image preview as a thumbnail.

property.name: fullSizePreview
property.shortdesc: If true, shows the image preview as a full size image.

property.name: macOSThumbnail
property.shortdesc: If true, creates a thumbnail when saving the image in Mac OS.

property.name: windowsThumbnail
property.shortdesc: If true, creates a thumbnail when saving the image in Windows. (Requires hardware support.)

property.name: appendExtension
property.shortdesc: Save files with extensions on Windows.

property.name: useLowerCaseExtension
property.shortdesc: If true, the file extension is lowercase.

property.name: askBeforeSavingLayeredTIFF
property.shortdesc: If true, asks the user to verify layer preservation options when saving a file in TIFF format.

property.name: maximizeCompatibility
property.shortdesc: The behavior to use to check whether to maximize compatibility when opening Adobe Photoshop (PSD) files.

property.name: recentFileListLength
property.shortdesc: The number of items in the recent file list. Range: 0 to 30.

property.name: colorChannelsInColor
property.shortdesc: If true, displays component channels in the Channels palette in color.

property.name: useDiffusionDither
property.shortdesc: If true, uses diffusion dither.

property.name: pixelDoubling
property.shortdesc: If true, halves the resolution or (doubles the size of pixels) to make previews display more quickly.

property.name: paintingCursors
property.shortdesc: The type of pointer to use.

property.name: otherCursors
property.shortdesc: The type of pointer to use.

property.name: gridSize
property.shortdesc: The size of grid squares.

property.name: useVideoAlpha
property.shortdesc: If true, enables Adobe Photoshop to send transparency information to your computer’s video board. (Requires hardware support.)

property.name: gamutWarningOpacity
property.shortdesc: The opacity (as a percentage) of the warning color for out-of-gamut colors. Range: 0 to 100.

property.name: rulerUnits
property.shortdesc: The unit that the scripting system uses when receiving and returning values.

property.name: typeUnits
property.shortdesc: The unit type-size that the numeric inputs are assumed to represent.

property.name: columnWidth
property.shortdesc: The width of columns (in points)

property.name: columnGutter
property.shortdesc: The gutter of columns (in points)

property.name: pointSize
property.shortdesc: The point/pica size.

property.name: guideStyle
property.shortdesc: The formatting style for non-printing guide lines.

property.name: gridStyle
property.shortdesc: The formatting style for non-printing grid lines.

property.name: gridSubDivisions
property.shortdesc: The value by which to subdivide the grid.

property.name: showSliceNumber
property.shortdesc: If true, displays slice numbers in the document window when using the Slice tool.

property.name: useAdditionalPluginFolder
property.shortdesc: If true, uses an additional folder for compatible plug-ins stored with a different application.

property.name: additionalPluginFolder
property.shortdesc: The path to the additional plug-in folder. Valid only when 'use additional plugin folder' = true.

property.name: imageCacheLevels
property.shortdesc: The number of images to hold in the cache. Range: 1 to 8.

property.name: imageCacheForHistograms
property.shortdesc: If true, shows the current image cache used to create the histogram.

property.name: maxRAMuse
property.shortdesc: Maximum percentage of available RAM used by Photoshop.

property.name: useHistoryLog
property.shortdesc: Turn on and off the history logging.

property.name: saveLogItems
property.shortdesc: Options for saving the history items.

property.name: editLogItems
property.shortdesc: Options for edit log items.

property.name: saveLogItemsFile
property.shortdesc: File to save the history log.

property.name: fontPreviewSize
property.shortdesc: Show font previews in the type tool font menus.

classdef.name: DocumentPrintSettings
classdef.shortdesc: Print settings for a document.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: caption
property.shortdesc: Description field from File Info.

property.name: labels
property.shortdesc: Prints the document title.

property.name: cornerCropMarks
property.shortdesc: Print corner crop marks.

property.name: centerCropMarks
property.shortdesc: Print center crop marks.

property.name: colorBars
property.shortdesc: Print color calibration bars.

property.name: registrationMarks
property.shortdesc: Print registration marks.

property.name: negative
property.shortdesc: Invert the image colors.

property.name: flip
property.shortdesc: Flip the image horizontally.

property.name: vectorData
property.shortdesc: Include vector data.

property.name: backgroundColor
property.shortdesc: Background color of page.

property.name: renderIntent
property.shortdesc: Color conversion intent when print space is different from the source space.

property.name: hardProof
property.shortdesc: Print a hard proof.

property.name: printSpace
property.shortdesc: Color space for printer. Can be nothing (meaning same as source) or a string specifying a specific color profile.

property.name: mapBlack
property.shortdesc: Map blacks.

property.name: printBorder
property.shortdesc: Width of the print border.

property.name: bleedWidth
property.shortdesc: Bleed width.

property.name: colorHandling
property.shortdesc: Color handling.

property.name: copies
property.shortdesc: Number of copies.

property.name: docPosition
property.shortdesc: Position of image when printing.

property.name: posY
property.shortdesc: Y position of image on page.

property.name: posX
property.shortdesc: X position of image on page.

property.name: printerName
property.shortdesc: Name of printer.

property.name: scale
property.shortdesc: Scale of image on page.

property.name: activePrinter
property.shortdesc: Currently selected printer.

property.name: printers
property.shortdesc: List of available printers.

method.name: setPagePosition
method.shortdesc: Set the position of the image on the page.

parameter.name: docPosition
parameter.shortdesc: Position of the image on page when printing. Can be centered, scale to fit, or user defined.

parameter.name: posX
parameter.shortdesc: X position of image on page.

parameter.name: posY
parameter.shortdesc: Y position of image on page.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.shortdesc: Position of the image on page when printing. Can be centered, scale to fit, or user defined.

classdef.name: Selection
classdef.shortdesc: The selected area of the document or layer.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: bounds
property.shortdesc: The bounding rectangle of the entire selection.

property.name: solid
property.shortdesc: If true, the bounding rectangle a solid rectangle.

method.name: clear
method.shortdesc: Clears the selection and does not copy it to the clipboard.

method.name: copy
method.shortdesc: Copies the selection to the clipboard.

parameter.name: merge
parameter.shortdesc: If true the copy includes all visible layers. If false, copies only from the current layer.

method.name: cut
method.shortdesc: Cuts the current selection to the clipboard.

method.name: selectBorder
method.shortdesc: Selects the selection border only (in the specified width); subsequent actions do not affect the selected area within the borders.

parameter.name: width
parameter.shortdesc: The width of the border selection.

method.name: contract
method.shortdesc: Contracts the selection.

parameter.name: by
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to contract the selection.

method.name: fill
method.shortdesc: Fills the selection.

parameter.name: fillType
parameter.shortdesc: The color or history state with which to fill the object.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.shortdesc: The color blend mode.

parameter.name: opacity
parameter.shortdesc: The opacity as a percentage. Range: 1 to 100.

parameter.name: preserveTransparency
parameter.shortdesc: If true, perserves transparencies.

method.name: stroke
method.shortdesc: Strokes the selection.

parameter.name: strokeColor
parameter.shortdesc: The color to stroke the selection with.

parameter.name: width
parameter.shortdesc: The stroke width.

parameter.name: location
parameter.shortdesc: The stroke location.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.shortdesc: The color blend mode.

parameter.name: opacity
parameter.shortdesc: The opacity of the stroke color as a percentage. Range: 1 to 100.

parameter.name: preserveTransparency
parameter.shortdesc: If true, preserves transparency.

method.name: selectAll
method.shortdesc: Selects the entire layer.

method.name: deselect
method.shortdesc: Deselects the current selection.

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the specified region.

parameter.name: region
parameter.shortdesc: Array of x and y coordinates that describe the corners of the selection, in the format [[x1, y1], [x2,y2],[x3, y3], [x4,y4]]

parameter.name: type
parameter.shortdesc: The method for combining the new selection with the existing selection.

parameter.name: feather
parameter.shortdesc: The feather amount.

parameter.name: antiAlias
parameter.shortdesc: If true, anti-aliasing is used.

method.name: expand
method.shortdesc: Expands the selection.

parameter.name: by
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to expand the selection.

method.name: feather
method.shortdesc: Feathers the edges of the selection.

parameter.name: by
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to feather the edge.

method.name: grow
method.shortdesc: Grows the selection to include all adjacent pixels falling within the specified tolerance range.

parameter.name: tolerance
parameter.shortdesc: The tolerance range. Range: 0 to 255.

parameter.name: antiAlias
parameter.shortdesc: If true, anti-aliasing is used.

method.name: invert
method.shortdesc: Inverts the selection.

method.name: similar
method.shortdesc: Grows the selection to include pixels throughout the image falling within the tolerance range.

parameter.name: tolerance
parameter.shortdesc: The tolerance range. Range: 0 to 255.

parameter.name: antiAlias
parameter.shortdesc: If true, anti-aliasing is used.

method.name: smooth
method.shortdesc: Cleans up stray pixels left inside or outside a color-based selection (within the radius specified in pixels).

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The sample radius in pixels. Range: 0 to 100.

method.name: store
method.shortdesc: Saves the selection as a channel.

parameter.name: into
parameter.shortdesc: The channel to save the selection to.

parameter.name: combination
parameter.shortdesc: How to add the selection to the existing contents of the channel.

method.name: load
method.shortdesc: Loads the selection from the specified channel.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The channel to load the selection from.

parameter.name: combination
parameter.shortdesc: How to combine the channel contents with the existing selection.

parameter.name: inverting
parameter.shortdesc: If true, selects the inverse of the channel contents.

method.name: translate
method.shortdesc: Moves the object relative to its current position.

parameter.name: deltaX
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to move the object horizontally.

parameter.name: deltaY
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to move the object vertically.

method.name: translateBoundary
method.shortdesc: Moves the boundary of selection relative to its current position.

parameter.name: deltaX
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to move the object horizontally.

parameter.name: deltaY
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to move the object vertically.

method.name: rotate
method.shortdesc: Rotates the object.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.shortdesc: The number of degrees to rotate the object.

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.shortdesc: The point to rotate about.

method.name: rotateBoundary
method.shortdesc: Rotates the boundary of the selection.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.shortdesc: The rotation angle (in degrees)

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.shortdesc: The point to rotate about.

method.name: resize
method.shortdesc: Resizes the selected area to the specified dimensions and anchor position.

parameter.name: horizontal
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to scale the selection horizontally (as a percentage).

parameter.name: vertical
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to scale the selection vertically (as a percentage).

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.shortdesc: The point to scale around.

method.name: resizeBoundary
method.shortdesc: Scales the boundary of the selection.

parameter.name: horizontal
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to scale the object horizontally (as a percentage).

parameter.name: vertical
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to scale the object vertically (as a percentage).

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.shortdesc: The point to scale around.

method.name: makeWorkPath
method.shortdesc: Makes this selection item the workpath for this document.

parameter.name: tolerance
parameter.shortdesc: The tolerance in pixels.

classdef.name: LayerSet
classdef.shortdesc: A group of layer objects, which can include art layer objects and other (nested) layer set objects. A single command or set of commands manipulates all layers in a layer set object.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: enabledChannels
property.shortdesc: The channels that are enabled for the layer set. Must be a list of component channels.

property.name: layers
property.shortdesc: The layers in this layer set.

property.name: layerSets
property.shortdesc: The layer sets contained within the layer set.

property.name: artLayers
property.shortdesc: The art layers contained in this layer set.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Adds an element.

method.name: merge
method.shortdesc: Merges the layer set.

classdef.name: ArtLayer
classdef.shortdesc: An object within a document that contains the visual elements of the image (equivalent to a layer in the Adobe Photoshop application).

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: fillOpacity
property.shortdesc: The interior opacity of the layer. Range: 0.0 to 100.0.

property.name: layerMaskDensity
property.shortdesc: The density of the layer mask (between 0.0 and 100.0)

property.name: layerMaskFeather
property.shortdesc: The feather of the layer mask (between 0.0 and 250.0)

property.name: vectorMaskDensity
property.shortdesc: The density of the vector mask (between 0.0 and 100.0)

property.name: vectorMaskFeather
property.shortdesc: The feather of the vector mask (between 0.0 and 250.0)

property.name: filterMaskDensity
property.shortdesc: The density of the filter mask (between 0.0 and 100.0)

property.name: filterMaskFeather
property.shortdesc: The feather of the filter mask (between 0.0 and 250.0)

property.name: grouped
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is grouped with the layer below.

property.name: isBackgroundLayer
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is a background layer.

property.name: pixelsLocked
property.shortdesc: If true, the pixels in the layer's image cannot be edited.

property.name: positionLocked
property.shortdesc: If true, the pixels in the layer's image cannot be moved within the layer.

property.name: transparentPixelsLocked
property.shortdesc: If true, editing is confined to the opaque portions of the layer.

property.name: kind
property.shortdesc: Sets the layer kind (such as 'text layer') for an empty layer. Valid only when the layer is empty and when 'is background layer ' is false. You can use the 'kind ' property to make a background layer a normal layer; however, to make a layer a background layer, you must set 'is background layer' to true.

property.name: textItem
property.shortdesc: The text that is associated with the layer. Valid only when 'kind' is text layer.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Adds an element.

method.name: applyStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified style to the layer.

parameter.name: styleName
parameter.shortdesc: The layer style to apply.

parameter.name: file
parameter.shortdesc: Style file to apply.

parameter.name: file
parameter.shortdesc: File to save the style to.

parameter.name: thumbnail
parameter.shortdesc: File to save the style thumbnail to.

parameter.name: thumbnailSize
parameter.shortdesc: Size of thumbnail to save.

parameter.name: backgroundValue
parameter.shortdesc: Background grayvalue.

method.name: clear
method.shortdesc: Cuts the layer without moving it to the clipboard.

method.name: copy
method.shortdesc: Copies the layer to the clipboard.

parameter.name: merge
parameter.shortdesc: If true, the copy includes all visible layers. If false, the copy only copies from the current layer.

method.name: cut
method.shortdesc: Cuts the layer to the clipboard.

method.name: merge
method.shortdesc: Merges the layer down, removing the layer from the document. Returns a reference to the art layer that this layer is merged into.

method.name: rasterize
method.shortdesc: Converts the targeted content in the layer into a flat, raster image.

parameter.name: target
parameter.shortdesc: What to rasterize.

method.name: applyAverage
method.shortdesc: Applies the average filter.

method.name: applyGaussianBlur
method.shortdesc: Applies the gaussian blur filter.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The blur width in pixels. Range: 1.0 to 250.0.

method.name: applyLensBlur
method.shortdesc: Apply the lens blur filter.

parameter.name: source
parameter.shortdesc: The source for the depth map.

parameter.name: focalDistance
parameter.shortdesc: The blur focal distance (in pixels) for the depth map. RangeL 0 to 255. Valid only when 'source' is transparency or layer mask.

parameter.name: invertDepthMap
parameter.shortdesc: If true, inverts the depth map.

parameter.name: shape
parameter.shortdesc: The shape of the iris.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The radius of the iris. Range: 0 to 100.

parameter.name: bladeCurvature
parameter.shortdesc: The blade curvature of the iris. Range: 0 to 100.

parameter.name: rotation
parameter.shortdesc: The rotation of the iris (in degrees). Range: 0 to 360.

parameter.name: brightness
parameter.shortdesc: The brightness for the specular highlights. Range: 0 to 100.

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.shortdesc: The threshold for the specular highlights. Range: 0 to 255.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of noise. Range: 0 to 100.

parameter.name: distribution
parameter.shortdesc: The distribution value for the noise.

parameter.name: monochromatic
parameter.shortdesc: If true, the noise is monochromatic.

method.name: applyBlur
method.shortdesc: Applies the blur filter.

method.name: applyBlurMore
method.shortdesc: Applies the blur more filter.

method.name: applyMotionBlur
method.shortdesc: Applies the motion blur filter.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.shortdesc: The angle (in degrees). Range: -360 to 360.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The radius (in pixels). Range: 1 to 999.

method.name: applyRadialBlur
method.shortdesc: Applies the radial blur filter.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of blur. Range: 1 to 100.

parameter.name: blurMethod
parameter.shortdesc: The blur method to use.

parameter.name: blurQuality
parameter.shortdesc: The smoothness or graininess of the blurred image.

parameter.name: blurCenter
parameter.shortdesc: Position (unit value)

method.name: applySmartBlur
method.shortdesc: Applies the smart blur filter.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The blur radius. Range: 0 - 1000.

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.shortdesc: The blur threshold. Range: 0 - 1000.

parameter.name: blurQuality
parameter.shortdesc: The smoothness or graininess of the blurred image.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.shortdesc: The smart blur mode.

method.name: applyDiffuseGlow
method.shortdesc: Applies the diffuse glow filter.

parameter.name: graininess
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of graininess. Range: 0 to 10.

parameter.name: glowAmount
parameter.shortdesc: The glow amount. Range: 0 to 20.

parameter.name: clearAmount
parameter.shortdesc: The clear amount. Range: 0 to 20.

method.name: applyDisplace
method.shortdesc: Applies the displace filter.

parameter.name: horizontalScale
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of horizontal distortion. Range: -999 to 999.

parameter.name: verticalScale
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of vertical distortion. Range: -999 to 999.

parameter.name: displacementType
parameter.shortdesc: The displacement type.

parameter.name: undefinedAreas
parameter.shortdesc: The treatment of undistorted areas.

parameter.name: displacementMapFile
parameter.shortdesc: The distortion image map.

method.name: applyGlassEffect
method.shortdesc: Applies the glass filter.

parameter.name: distortion
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of distortion. Range: 0 to 20.

parameter.name: smoothness
parameter.shortdesc: The smoothness. Range: 1 to 15.

parameter.name: scaling
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of scaling. Range: 50 to 200.

parameter.name: invert
parameter.shortdesc: If true, the texture is inverted.

parameter.name: texture
parameter.shortdesc: The type of texture.

parameter.name: textureFile
parameter.shortdesc: The file from which to load the texture type.

method.name: applyOceanRipple
method.shortdesc: Applies the ocean ripple filter.

parameter.name: size
parameter.shortdesc: The ripple size. Range: 1 to 15.

parameter.name: magnitude
parameter.shortdesc: The ripple magnitude. Range: 0 to 20.

method.name: applyPinch
method.shortdesc: Applies the pinch filter.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: The pinch amount. Range: -100 to 100.

method.name: applyPolarCoordinates
method.shortdesc: Applies the polar coordinates filter.

parameter.name: conversion
parameter.shortdesc: The conversion type.

method.name: applyRipple
method.shortdesc: Applies the ripple filter.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: The ripple amount. Range: -999 to 999.

parameter.name: size
parameter.shortdesc: The ripple size.

method.name: applyShear
method.shortdesc: Applies the shear filter.

parameter.name: curve
parameter.shortdesc: Specification of the shear curve in points as x,y coordinate pairs in the format [[x1, y1],[x2, y2]]. Any number of coordinate pairs can be specified.

parameter.name: undefinedAreas
parameter.shortdesc: The treatment of areas left blank by the distortion.

method.name: applySpherize
method.shortdesc: Applies the spherize filter.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of distortion. Range: -100 to 100.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.shortdesc: The distortion mode.

method.name: applyTwirl
method.shortdesc: Applies the twirl filter.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.shortdesc: The twirl angle. Range: -999 to 999.

method.name: applyWave
method.shortdesc: Applies the wave filter.

parameter.name: generatorNumber
parameter.shortdesc: The number of generators. Range: 1 to 999.

parameter.name: minimumWavelength
parameter.shortdesc: The minimum wave length. Range: 1 to 998.

parameter.name: maximumWavelength
parameter.shortdesc: The maximum wave length. Range: 2 to (minimum wavelength + 1)

parameter.name: minimumAmplitude
parameter.shortdesc: The minimum amplitude. Range: 1 to 998.

parameter.name: maximumAmplitude
parameter.shortdesc: The maximum amplitude. Range: 2 to (minimum amplitude + 1)

parameter.name: horizontalScale
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of horizontal scale (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 100.

parameter.name: verticalScale
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of vertical scale (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 100.

parameter.name: waveType
parameter.shortdesc: The wave type.

parameter.name: undefinedAreas
parameter.shortdesc: The treatment of areas left blank by the distortion.

parameter.name: randomSeed
parameter.shortdesc: The random seed.

method.name: applyZigZag
method.shortdesc: Applies the zigzag filter.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of zigzag. Range: -100 to 100.

parameter.name: ridges
parameter.shortdesc: The ridge length.

parameter.name: style
parameter.shortdesc: The zigzag style.

method.name: applyAddNoise
method.shortdesc: Applies the add noise filter.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of noise (as a percentage). Range: 0.1 to 400.0.

parameter.name: distribution
parameter.shortdesc: The noise distribution type.

parameter.name: monochromatic
parameter.shortdesc: If true, applies the filter only to the tonal elements in the image without changing the colors.

method.name: applyDespeckle
method.shortdesc: Applies the despeckle filter.

method.name: applyDustAndScratches
method.shortdesc: Applies the dust and scratches filter.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The size (in pixels) of the area searched for dissimilar pixels. Range: 1 to 16.

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.shortdesc: Determines how dissimilar the pixels should be before they are eliminated. Range: 0 to 255.

method.name: applyMedianNoise
method.shortdesc: Applies the median noise filter.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The size of the area searched for pixels of similar brightness. Range: 0 to 100.

method.name: applyClouds
method.shortdesc: Applies the clouds filter.

method.name: applyDifferenceClouds
method.shortdesc: Applies the difference clouds filter.

method.name: applyLensFlare
method.shortdesc: Applies the lens flare filter.

parameter.name: brightness
parameter.shortdesc: The flare brightness. Range: 10 to 300.

parameter.name: flareCenter
parameter.shortdesc: The position of the flare center.

parameter.name: lensType
parameter.shortdesc: The lens type.

method.name: applyTextureFill
method.shortdesc: Applies the texture fill filter.

parameter.name: textureFile
parameter.shortdesc: The texture file. Must be a grayscale Photoshop file.

method.name: applySharpen
method.shortdesc: Applies the sharpen filter.

method.name: applySharpenEdges
method.shortdesc: Applies the sharpen edges filter.

method.name: applySharpenMore
method.shortdesc: Applies the sharpen more filter.

method.name: applyUnSharpMask
method.shortdesc: Applies the unsharp mask filter.

parameter.name: amount
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of sharpening (as a percentage). Range: 1 to 500.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The radius in pixels. Range: 0.1 to 250.0.

parameter.name: threshold
parameter.shortdesc: The contrast threshold. Range: 0 to 255.

method.name: applyDeInterlace
method.shortdesc: Applies the de-interlace filter.

parameter.name: eliminateFields
parameter.shortdesc: The fields to eliminate.

parameter.name: createFields
parameter.shortdesc: The method to use to replace eliminated fields.

method.name: applyNTSC
method.shortdesc: Applies the NTSC colors filter.

method.name: applyCustomFilter
method.shortdesc: Applies the custom filter.

parameter.name: characteristics
parameter.shortdesc: The custom filter characteristics. This is an array of 25 values that corresponds to a left-to-right, top-to- bottom traversal of the array presented in the Custom dialog in the user interface (Filter > Other > Custom).

parameter.name: scale
parameter.shortdesc: The value by which to divide the sum of the brightness values of the pixels included in the calculation.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.shortdesc: The value to be added to the result of the scale calculation.

method.name: applyHighPass
method.shortdesc: Applies the high pass filter.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The width (in pixels) of the radius where edge details are retained.

method.name: applyMaximum
method.shortdesc: Applies the maximum filter.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The choke area (in pixels). Range: 0 to 100.

method.name: applyMinimum
method.shortdesc: Applies the minimum filter.

parameter.name: radius
parameter.shortdesc: The spread area (in pixels). Range: 0 to 100.

method.name: applyOffset
method.shortdesc: Applies the offset filter.

parameter.name: horizontal
parameter.shortdesc: The amount (in pixels) to move the selection horizontally (to the right). Range: -6144 to 6144.

parameter.name: vertical
parameter.shortdesc: The amount (in pixels) to move the selection vertically (downward). Range: -6144 to 6144.

parameter.name: undefinedAreas
parameter.shortdesc: The method for filling areas left blank by the offset.

method.name: adjustLevels
method.shortdesc: Adjusts levels of the selected channels.

parameter.name: inputRangeStart
parameter.shortdesc: The input levels minimum. Range: 0 to 253.

parameter.name: inputRangeEnd
parameter.shortdesc: The input levels maximum. Range: (input range start + 2) to 253.

parameter.name: inputRangeGamma
parameter.shortdesc: The input levels gamma. Range: 0.10 to 9.99.

parameter.name: outputRangeStart
parameter.shortdesc: The output levels minimum. Range: 0 to 253.

parameter.name: outputRangeEnd
parameter.shortdesc: The output levels maximum. Range: (output range start + 2) to 253.

method.name: autoLevels
method.shortdesc: Adjust the levels of the selected channels using the auto levels option.

method.name: autoContrast
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the contrast of the selected channels automatically.

method.name: adjustCurves
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the tonal range of the selected channel using up to fourteen points.

parameter.name: curveShape
parameter.shortdesc: The curve points. The number of points must be between 2 and 14.

method.name: adjustBrightnessContrast
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the brightness and constrast.

parameter.name: brightness
parameter.shortdesc: The brightness amount. Range: -100 to 100.

parameter.name: contrast
parameter.shortdesc: The contrast amount. Range: -100 to 100.

method.name: adjustColorBalance
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the color balance of the layer's component channels.

parameter.name: shadows
parameter.shortdesc: The adjustments for the shadows. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameter.name: midtones
parameter.shortdesc: The adjustments for the midtones. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameter.name: highlights
parameter.shortdesc: The adjustments for the highlights. The array must include three values (in the range -100 to 100), which represent cyan or red, magenta or green, and yellow or blue, when the document mode is CMYK or RGB.

parameter.name: preserveLuminosity
parameter.shortdesc: If true, luminosity is preserved.

method.name: desaturate
method.shortdesc: Converts a color image to a grayscale image in the current color mode by assigning equal values of each component color to each pixel.

parameter.name: selectionMethod
parameter.shortdesc: Modifies the amount of a process color in a specified primary color without affecting the other primary colors.

parameter.name: reds
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameter.name: yellows
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameter.name: greens
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameter.name: cyans
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameter.name: blues
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameter.name: magentas
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameter.name: whites
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameter.name: neutrals
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

parameter.name: blacks
parameter.shortdesc: Array of 4 values: cyan, magenta, yellow, black.

method.name: mixChannels
method.shortdesc: Modifies a targeted (output) color channel using a mix of the existing color channels in the image. (output channels = An array of channel specifications. For each component channel, specify a list of adjustment values (-200 to 200) followed by a 'constant' value (-200 to 200).) When monochrome = true, the maximum number of channel value specifications is 1. Valid only when 'document mode' = RGB or CMYK. RGB arrays must include four doubles. CMYK arrays must include five doubles.

parameter.name: outputChannels
parameter.shortdesc: A list of channel specifications. For each component channel that the document has, you must specify a list of adjustment values followed by a 'constant' value.

parameter.name: monochrome
parameter.shortdesc: If true, uses monochrome mixing. Note: If this is true, you can only specify one channel value.

method.name: invert
method.shortdesc: Inverts the colors in the layer by converting the brightness value of each pixel in the channels to the inverse value on the 256-step color-values scale.

method.name: equalize
method.shortdesc: Redistributes the brightness values of pixels in an image to more evenly represent the entire range of brightness levels within the image.

method.name: threshold
method.shortdesc: Converts grayscale or color images to high-contrast, B/W images by converting pixels lighter than the specified threshold to white and pixels darker than the threshold to black.

parameter.name: level
parameter.shortdesc: The threshold level.

method.name: posterize
method.shortdesc: Specifies the number of tonal levels for each channel and then maps pixels to the closest matching level.

parameter.name: levels
parameter.shortdesc: The tonal levels. Range: 2 to 255.

method.name: photoFilter
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the layer's color balance and temperature as if a color filter had been applied.

parameter.name: fillColor
parameter.shortdesc: The color to use for the fill.

parameter.name: density
parameter.shortdesc: The density (as a percentage) of the filter effect. Range: 1 to 100.

parameter.name: preserveLuminosity
parameter.shortdesc: If true, luminosity is preserved.

method.name: shadowHighlight
method.shortdesc: Adjusts the range of tones in the shadows and highlights.

parameter.name: shadowAmount
parameter.shortdesc: The shadow amount, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100.

parameter.name: shadowWidth
parameter.shortdesc: The shadow width, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100 for tonal width (0 = narrow), (100 = broad).

parameter.name: shadowRaduis
parameter.shortdesc: The shadow radius (in pixels). Range: 0 to 2500.

parameter.name: highlightAmount
parameter.shortdesc: The highlight amount, as a percentage. Range: 0 to 100.

parameter.name: highlightWidth
parameter.shortdesc: The highlight width. Range: 0 to 100 for tonal width (0 = narrow), (100 = broad).

parameter.name: highlightRaduis
parameter.shortdesc: The highlight radius (in pixels). Range: 0 to 2500.

parameter.name: colorCorrection
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to adjust the colors in the changed portion of the image. Range: -100 to 100.

parameter.name: midtoneContrast
parameter.shortdesc: The amount of midtone contrast. Range: -100 to 100.

parameter.name: blackClip
parameter.shortdesc: Fractions of whites to be clipped. Range: 0.000 to 50.000.

parameter.name: whiteClip
parameter.shortdesc: Fractions of blacks to be clipped. Range: 0.000 to 50.000.

classdef.name: Layer
classdef.shortdesc: A layer object.
classdef.description: Layers may contain nested layers, which are called sublayers in the user interface. The layer object contains all of the page items in the specific layer as elements. Your script can access page items as elements of either the layer object or the document object.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the layer.

property.name: allLocked
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer's contents and settings are locked.

property.name: blendMode
property.shortdesc: The mode to use when compositing an object.

property.name: linkedLayers
property.shortdesc: The layers linked to this layer.

property.name: opacity
property.shortdesc: The layer's master opacity (as a percentage). Range: 0.0 to 100.0.

property.name: visible
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer is visible.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of this layer.

property.name: itemIndex
property.shortdesc: The layer index sans layer groups, how Photoshop would index them.

property.name: bounds
property.shortdesc: If the Layer is a layer set, this property returns a reference to the corresponding layer set object.

property.name: boundsNoEffects
property.shortdesc: Bounding rectangle of the Layer not including effects.

property.name: xmpMetadata
property.shortdesc: XMP metadata associated with the Layer.

method.name: move

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicate this object.

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes this object.

method.name: removeAll
method.shortdesc: Deletes all elements.

method.name: unlink

method.name: link
method.shortdesc: Links the layer with the specified layer.

parameter.name: with

method.name: translate

parameter.name: deltaX

parameter.name: deltaY
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to move the object vertically.

method.name: rotate
method.shortdesc: Rotates the object.

parameter.name: angle
parameter.shortdesc: The number of degrees to rotate the object.

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.shortdesc: The point to rotate about.

method.name: resize
method.shortdesc: Scales the object.

parameter.shortdesc: The amount to scale the object horizontally (as a percentage).

parameter.name: vertical
parameter.shortdesc: The amount to scale the object vertically (as a percentage).

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.shortdesc: The point to resize about.

classdef.name: Channel
classdef.shortdesc: Object that stores information about a color element in the image, analogous to a plate in the printing process that applies a single color. The document's color mode determines the number of default channels. For example, an RGB document has four default channels: A composite channel: RGB; and three component channels: red, green, and blue. A channel can also be an alpha channel, which stores selections as masks; or a spot channel, which stores spot colors.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: histogram
property.shortdesc: A histogram of the color of the channel.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The channel name.

property.name: kind
property.shortdesc: The type of channel.

property.name: opacity
property.shortdesc: The opacity of alpha channels (called solidity for spot channels). Range: 0 to 100. Valid only when 'type' = masked area or selected area.

property.name: visible
property.shortdesc: If true, the channel is visible.

property.name: color
property.shortdesc: The color of the channel. Not valid for component channels.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Adds an element.

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicate this object.

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes this object.

method.name: removeAll
method.shortdesc: Deletes all elements.

method.name: merge
method.shortdesc: Merges a spot channel into the component channels.

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicates the channel.

parameter.name: targetDocument
parameter.shortdesc: The document to duplicate the channel to.

property.name: direction

method.name: removeAll

classdef.shortdesc: A version of the document stored automatically (and added to the history states collection, which preserves the document state each time the document is changed).

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: name

property.name: snapshot

classdef.name: TextItem
classdef.shortdesc: The text object contained in an art layer.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: antiAliasMethod
property.shortdesc: The method of anti-aliasing to use.

property.name: autoKerning
property.shortdesc: Options for auto kerning.

property.name: color
property.shortdesc: The text color.

property.name: useAutoLeading
property.shortdesc: If true, uses the font's built-in leading information.

property.name: tracking
property.shortdesc: The amount of uniform spacing between multiple characters. Range: -1000 to 10000.

property.name: verticalScale
property.shortdesc: Character scaling (vertical) in proportion to horizontal scale. Range: 0 - 1000 as a percentage.

property.name: horizontalScale
property.shortdesc: Character scaling (horizontal) in proportion to horizontal scale. Range: 0 - 1000 as a percentage.

property.name: baselineShift
property.shortdesc: The amount of baseline offset of text.

property.name: contents
property.shortdesc: The actual text in the layer.

property.name: font
property.shortdesc: The text face of the character.

property.name: leading
property.shortdesc: The leading amount.

property.name: ligatures
property.shortdesc: If true, ligatures are used.

property.name: alternateLigatures
property.shortdesc: If true, alternate ligatures are used.

property.name: oldStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, old style is used.

property.name: position
property.shortdesc: The position of the origin for the text. The array must contain two values. Setting this property is basically equivalent to clicking the text tool at a point in the document to create the point of origin for text.

property.name: direction
property.shortdesc: The text orientation.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The font size in points.

property.name: fauxBold
property.shortdesc: If true, faux bold is used.

property.name: fauxItalic
property.shortdesc: If true, faux italic is used.

property.name: capitalization
property.shortdesc: The case of the text.

property.name: strikeThru
property.shortdesc: The strike through option to use.

property.name: underline
property.shortdesc: Options for underlining the text.

property.name: language
property.shortdesc: The language.

property.name: noBreak
property.shortdesc: If true, words are not allowed to break at the end of a line. When enacted on large amounts of consecutive characters, can prevent word wrap and thus may prevent some text from appearing on the screen.

property.name: kind
property.shortdesc: The type of text.

property.name: justification
property.shortdesc: The paragraph justification.

property.name: leftIndent
property.shortdesc: The amount to indent text from the left. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: firstLineIndent
property.shortdesc: The amount to indent the first line of paragraphs. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: rightIndent
property.shortdesc: The amount to indent text from the right. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: spaceBefore
property.shortdesc: The amount of space before each paragraph. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: spaceAfter
property.shortdesc: The amount of space after each paragraph. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: hangingPuntuation
property.shortdesc: If true, uses Roman hanging punctuation.

property.name: textComposer
property.shortdesc: The text composing engine to use.

property.name: hyphenation
property.shortdesc: If true, hyphenation is used.

property.name: minimumGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The minimum amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: desiredGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The desired amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: maximumGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The maximum amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: minimumLetterScaling
property.shortdesc: The minimum amount of space (as a percentage) between letters. Range: 100 to 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: desiredLetterScaling
property.shortdesc: The amount of space (as a percentage) between letters. Range: 100 - 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: maximumLetterScaling
property.shortdesc: The maximum amount (as a percentage) of space between letters. Range: 100 - 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: minimumWordScaling
property.shortdesc: The minimum amount (as a percentage) of space between words. Range: 0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: desiredWordScaling
property.shortdesc: The amount (as a percentage) of space between words. Range: 0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: maximumWordScaling
property.shortdesc: The maximum amount (as a percentage) of space between words (0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words). Valid only for justified text.

property.name: autoLeadingAmount
property.shortdesc: The percentage to use for auto leading. Range: 0.01 to 5000.00.

property.name: hyphenateWordsLongerThan
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of letters a word must have in order for hyphenation in word wrap to be allowed. Range: 2 to 25.

property.name: hyphenateAfterFirst
property.shortdesc: The number of letters after which hyphenation in word wrap is allowed. Range: 1 to 15.

property.name: hyphenateBeforeLast
property.shortdesc: The number of letters before which hyphenation in word wrap is allowed. Range: 1 to 15.

property.name: hyphenLimit
property.shortdesc: The maximum number of consecutive lines that can end with a hyphenated word.

property.name: hyphenationZone
property.shortdesc: The distance at the end of a line that will cause a word to break in unjustified type. Range: 0 - 720 picas.

property.name: hyphenateCapitalWords
property.shortdesc: If true, capitalized words can be hyphenated.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The width of the bounding box for paragraph text.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The height of the bounding box for paragraph text.

property.name: warpStyle
property.shortdesc: The style of warp.

property.name: warpDirection
property.shortdesc: The warp direction.

property.name: warpBend
property.shortdesc: The warp bend percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

property.name: warpHorizontalDistortion
property.shortdesc: The warp horizontal distortion percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

property.name: warpVerticalDistortion
property.shortdesc: The warp vertical distortion percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

method.shortdesc: Converts the text object and its containing layer to a fill layer with the text changed to a clipping path.

classdef.name: LayerComp

method.name: deselect

classdef.name: SubPathItem
classdef.shortdesc: Information about a path. You do not use the sub path item object to create a path. Rather, you create path segments using the sub path info object. Use the sub path item object to retrieve information about a path. All properties are read-only.

Rather, you use the path point object to retrieve information about the points that describe path segments. To create path points, use the path point info object.

method.name: encodeURI
method.shortdesc: Encodes a string after RFC2396.
method.description: Create an UTF-8 ASCII encoded version of this string. The string is converted into UTF-8. Every non-alphanumeric character is encoded as a percent escape character of the form %xx, where xx is the hex value of the character. After the conversion to UTF-8 encoding and escaping, it is guaranteed that the string does not contain characters codes greater than 127. The list of characters not to be encoded is -_.!~*'();/?:@&=+$,#. The method returns false on errors.

parameter.name: text
parameter.shortdesc: The text to encode.

method.name: encodeURIComponent
method.shortdesc: Encodes a string after RFC2396.
method.description: Create an UTF-8 ASCII encoded version of this string. The string is converted into UTF-8. Every non-alphanumeric character is encoded as a percent escape character of the form %xx, where xx is the hex value of the character. After the conversion to UTF-8 encoding and escaping, it is guaranteed that the string does not contain characters codes greater than 127. The list of characters not to be encoded is -_.!~*'(). The method returns false on errors.

parameter.name: text
parameter.shortdesc: The text to encode.

method.name: decodeURI
method.shortdesc: Decodes a string created with encodeURI().

parameter.name: uri
parameter.shortdesc: The text to decode.

method.name: decodeURIComponent
method.shortdesc: Decodes a string created with encodeURIComponent().

parameter.name: uri
parameter.shortdesc: The text to decode.

method.name: escape
method.shortdesc: Creates a URL-encoded string from aString.
method.description: In the new string, characters of aString that require URL encoding are replaced with the format %xx, where xx is the hexadecimal value of the character code in the Unicode character set. This format is used to transmit information appended to a URL during, for example, execution of the GET method. Use the unescape() global function to translate the string back into its original format. Returns a string which is aString URL-encoded.

parameter.name: aString
parameter.shortdesc: The string to be encoded.

method.name: eval
method.shortdesc: Evaluates its argument as a JavaScript script, and returns the result of evaluation.
method.description: You can pass the result of an object's toSource() method to reconstruct that object.

parameter.name: stringExpression
parameter.shortdesc: The string to evaluate.

method.name: uneval
method.shortdesc: Creates a source code representation of the supplied argument, and returns it as a string.

parameter.name: what
parameter.shortdesc: The object to uneval.

method.name: isFinite
method.shortdesc: Evaluates an expression and reports whether the result is a finite number.
method.description: Returns true if the expression is a finite number, false otherwise. False if the value is infinity or negative infinity.

parameter.name: expression
parameter.shortdesc: Any valid JavaScript expression.

method.name: isNaN
method.shortdesc: Evaluates an expression and reports whether the result is "Not-a-Number" (NaN).
method.description: Returns true if the result of evaluation is not a number (NaN), false if the value is a number.

parameter.name: expression
parameter.shortdesc: Any valid JavaScript expression.

method.name: parseInt
method.shortdesc: Extracts an integer from a string.
method.description: Parses a string to find the first set of characters, in a specified base, that can be converted to an integer, and returns that integer, or NaN if it does not encounter characters that it can convert to a number.

parameter.name: text
parameter.shortdesc: The string from which to extract an integer.

parameter.name: base
parameter.shortdesc: The base of the string to parse (from base 2 to base 36).
parameter.description: If not supplied, base is determined by the format of string.

method.name: parseFloat
method.shortdesc: Extracts a floating-point number from a string.
method.description: Parses a string to find the first set of characters that can be converted to a floating point number, and returns that number, or NaN if it does not encounter characters that it can converted to a number. The function supports exponential notation.

parameter.name: text
parameter.shortdesc: The string from which to extract a floating point number.

method.name: unescape
method.shortdesc: Translates URL-encoded string into a regular string, and returns that string.
method.description: Use the escape() global function to URL-encode strings.

parameter.name: stringExpression
parameter.shortdesc: The URL-encoded string to convert.

method.name: localize
method.shortdesc: Localizes a ZString-encoded string and merges additional arguments into the string.

parameter.name: what
parameter.shortdesc: The string to localize. A ZString-encoded string that can contain placeholder for additional arguments in the form %1 to %n.

parameter.name: argument
parameter.shortdesc: Optional argument(s) to be merged into the string.

method.name: isXMLName
method.shortdesc: Returns true is the supplied string is a valid XML name.

parameter.name: name
parameter.shortdesc: The XML name to test.

method.name: setDefaultXMLNamespace
method.shortdesc: Defines the default XML namespace.
method.description: This is a replacement function for the standard JavaScript statement set default xml namespace.

parameter.name: namespace
parameter.shortdesc: The namespace to use.
parameter.description: Omit this parameter to return to the empty namespace. This is either a Namespace object or a string.

method.name: alert
method.shortdesc: Displays an alert box

parameter.name: message
parameter.shortdesc: The text to display

parameter.name: title
parameter.shortdesc: The title of the alert; ignored on the Macintosh

parameter.name: errorIcon
parameter.shortdesc: Display an Error icon; ignored on the Macintosh

method.name: confirm
method.shortdesc: Displays an alert box with Yes and No buttons; returns true for Yes

parameter.name: message
parameter.shortdesc: The text to display

parameter.name: noAsDefault
parameter.shortdesc: Set to true to set the No button as the default button

parameter.name: title
parameter.shortdesc: The title of the alert; ignored on the Macintosh

method.name: prompt
method.shortdesc: Displays a dialog allowing the user to enter text
method.description: Returns null if the user cancelled the dialog, the text otherwise

parameter.name: prompt
parameter.shortdesc: The text to display

parameter.name: default
parameter.shortdesc: The default text to preset the edit field with

parameter.name: title
parameter.shortdesc: The title of the dialog;

property.name: BridgeTalk
property.shortdesc: The global BridgeTalk object.

classdef.name: ElementPlacement
classdef.shortdesc: Controls where Photoshop places an element.

property.name: PLACEAFTER
property.shortdesc: Place after an element.

property.name: PLACEBEFORE
property.shortdesc: Place before an element.

property.name: PLACEATEND
property.shortdesc: Place an element at the end.
